titles.title: Welfare Dependency Act of 1993

A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop and implement an information gathering system to permit the measurement, analysis, and reporting of welfare dependency.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S555)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Welfare Dependency Act of 1993 - Amends title IV of the Social Security Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop indicators, rates, and predictors or welfare dependency. Establishes an Advisory Board on Welfare Dependency to advise the Secretary on their development. Requires the Secretary to report annually to the Congress on welfare dependency in the United States.
